App Switcher

  • has slide in/ out animation

Courtesy Menu

  • has fadeIn animation

Both Menus

  • will close when you click anywhere on page
  • will close when content is scrolled
  • upon close by scroll or click anywere will remove focus state on buttons (selected state)
  • both menus can be open at same time
